body: If you're reading this comment, you're probably okay. If you've posted a curse 5 times, you will have the worst luck over the next 10 years of your life, and you'll die after 10 years unless you apologize one time for every curse you've posted

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk
